p: Considering the data obtained for fungal growth on the refrigerated slices, as the studied fungi can grow at very acid or very basic pH, at temperatures from 0 °C to 37 °C, and at high or low substrate moisture levels, the results indicate the nanoemulsions encapsulating oregano essential oil presented very good antifungal activity, especially under conditions of low temperature, due to which there was no growth during storage for any length of time.
